short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: save links with easy retrieval in the future

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A platform that allows users to easily categorize and organize their URLs for easy retrieval in the future and thus simplifying the bookmarking experience so one can stop wasting time searching for their saved links
